properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu nangeekarinchedi vaari Perulu jeeva grandamunanda vraayu badun Nammakamaiyunna pavana kristuni Jeevamu pondi naduvudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni swaroopamu kalgina Yesu prabhu Manujaroopambuna janminchenu Chavunu gelchina paavana kristuni Jeevamu pondi naduvudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
